subject: Concerns about my refund
description_text:
Hey,

I've emailed you about my order (#SSN3936) that I wanted to refund, except I don't have any further news from you. You said that I had to send it to your warehouse in Germany, which is done. So here's the 2 link which will help you to track the delivery (it's already delivered) :

• CE636792546BE
-> https://track.bpost.cloud/btr/web/#/search?lang=fr&itemCode=CE636792546BE&postalCode=24536

• CE636792648BE
-> https://track.bpost.cloud/btr/web/#/search?lang=fr&itemCode=CE636792648BE&postalCode=24536

So… , do you know when I'll be refunded?

Thanks for your understanding,
Youness Rami.
